content: this adorable boho bag is one of my bestsellers at all of my vendor markets the stitch pattern adds interest without requiring a lining the beaded embellishments add just the right touch to make it a simple yet elegant bag i have also included a youtube video tutorial to help with the most difficult portions of the pattern **supplies needed ** -315-325 yds of bernat home maker decrease yarn you could also sub in double strands of regular worsted weight yarn or cotton yarn -size j 6 0 mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge -2 20 mm wooden beads -2 5 cm wooden ring -4 stitch markers -scissors yarn needle measuring tape **terms used and abbreviations ** pattern is written in us terminology back loop only - blo begin ning - beg chain s - chain s double_crochet - double_crochet exaggerated single_crochet - esc exaggerated waistcoat stitch - ews fasten_off - fo half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet repeat - repeat single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip slip_stitch - slip_stitch space s - sps stitch es - st s yarn over - yo **special terminology ** exaggerated single_crochet esc exaggerated waistcoat stitch ews both terms are explained in great detail in my pattern **gauge ** diameter of base after completing rounds 1-3 should measure approx 6 15 cm **finished measurements ** bucket version measures approx 16 x 20 41 x 51 cm prior to adding handles and laying flat tote version measures approx 16 x 20 41 x 51 cm prior to adding handles and laying flat and when made as written **there are no refunds for the purchase of my digital patterns all of my patterns have been tested and edited accordingly however there may still be lingering errors as i am human if you encounter an error please notify me and i will be happy to make the suggested edit s and send you the corrected copy if necessary **
